extension.searchTitle: COMMEMORATING THE 50TH ANNIVERSARY OF THE REUNIFICATION OF JERUSALEM; Congressional Record Vol. 163, No. 95

congVote.result: The resolution (S. Res. 176) was agreed to.
congVote.dailyDigestCategory2: 50th anniversary of the reunification of Jerusalem
congVote.dailyDigestSummary: <P/>By a unanimous vote of 90 yeas (Vote No. 138), Senate agreed to S. Res. 176, commemorating the 50th anniversary of the reunification of Jerusalem.
